languages.text: {n}Инквизитор недовольно морщится.{/n} "Ваше необдуманное поведение не только неуместно, но и опасно. Для вас. Мне оно, впрочем, не доставит неудобств и не помешает задать свои вопросы".

traits.locale_text: {n}Инквизитор пожимает плечами.{/n} "Если вам спокойнее, когда вы угрожаете мне — воля ваша, угрожайте. Мне это совершенно не помешает задать мои вопросы".

languages.text: {n}The Inquisitor winces in displeasure.{/n} "Your ill-considered behaviour is both inappropriate and dangerous. For you. It causes me no discomfort and won't hinder my enquiries in any way."
languages.original_text: {n}Инквизитор недовольно морщится.{/n} "Ваше необдуманное поведение не только неуместно, но и опасно. Для вас. Мне оно, впрочем, не доставит неудобств и не помешает задать свои вопросы".

traits.locale_text: {n}He winces in displeasure.{/n} "Your childish behaviour is both inappropriate and dangerous. For you. It causes me no discomfort and won't hinder my inquiries in any way."
{n}He winces in displeasure.{/n} "Your childish behaviour is both inappropriate and dangerous. For you. It causes me no discomfort and won't hinder my inquiries in any way."
{n}The Inquisitor winces in displeasure.{/n} "Your childish behaviour is both inappropriate and dangerous. For you. It causes me no discomfort and won't hinder my enquiries in any way."
{n}The Inquisitor winces in displeasure.{/n} "Your childish behaviour is both inappropriate and dangerous. For you. It causes me no discomfort and won't hinder my enquiries in any way."
{n}The Inquisitor winces in displeasure.{/n} "Your ill-considered behaviour is both inappropriate and dangerous. For you. It causes me no discomfort and won't hinder my enquiries in any way."
{n}The Inquisitor winces in displeasure.{/n} "Your ill-considered behaviour is both inappropriate and dangerous. For you. It causes me no discomfort and won't hinder my enquiries in any way."

languages.text: {n}異端審問官は不快感に顔をゆがめる。{/n}「分別のない行動は不適切かつ危険を招く。お前のために言おう。私は微塵もたじろがない。私の尋問は何をしようと防げぬ」
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor winces in displeasure.{/n} "Your ill-considered behaviour is both inappropriate and dangerous. For you. It causes me no discomfort and won't hinder my enquiries in any way."

traits.locale_text: {n}異端審問官は不快感に顔をゆがめる。{/n}「分別のない行動は不適切かつ危険を招く。お前のために言おう。私は微塵もたじろがない。私の尋問は何をしようと防げぬ」

languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor winces in displeasure.{/n} "Your ill-considered behaviour is both inappropriate and dangerous. For you. It causes me no discomfort and won't hinder my enquiries in any way."

languages.text: {n}大审判官不悦地皱起眉头。{/n}“这种鲁莽的行为很不得体，也很危险，我指的是对你而言。就我本人来说，我并不会为此感到不适，更不会因此停止调查。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor winces in displeasure.{/n} "Your ill-considered behaviour is both inappropriate and dangerous. For you. It causes me no discomfort and won't hinder my enquiries in any way."

traits.locale_text: {n}审判长不悦地皱起眉头。{/n}“这种鲁莽的行为很不得体，也很危险，我指的是对你而言。就我本人来说，我并不会为此感到不适，更不会因此停止调查。”

languages.text: {n}El Inquisidor hace una mueca de disgusto.{/n} «Su comportamiento atolondrado es inapropiado y peligroso. Para usted. A mí no me incomoda y no dificultará en absoluto mi investigación».
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor winces in displeasure.{/n} "Your ill-considered behaviour is both inappropriate and dangerous. For you. It causes me no discomfort and won't hinder my enquiries in any way."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Inquisidor hace una mueca de disgusto.{/n} «Su comportamiento atolondrado es inapropiado y peligroso. Para usted. A mí no me incomoda y no dificultará en absoluto mi investigación».

languages.text: {n}L'inquisiteur ne peut contenir une certaine irritation.{/n} « Votre réaction est tout à fait irréfléchie, déplacée et dangereuse. Pour vous. En ce qui me concerne, cela ne m'empêchera pas de poursuivre cet entretien. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor winces in displeasure.{/n} "Your ill-considered behaviour is both inappropriate and dangerous. For you. It causes me no discomfort and won't hinder my enquiries in any way."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'inquisiteur ne peut contenir une certaine irritation.{/n} « Votre réaction est tout à fait irréfléchie, déplacée et dangereuse. Pour vous. En ce qui me concerne, cela ne m'empêchera pas de poursuivre cet entretien. »

languages.text: {n}Der Inquisitor zuckt missmutig zusammen.{/n} "Euer kaum durchdachtes Verhalten ist ebenso unangemessen wie gefährlich. Für Euch. Mich stört es nicht, und es wird auch meine Ermittlungen in keiner Weise behindern."
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor winces in displeasure.{/n} "Your ill-considered behaviour is both inappropriate and dangerous. For you. It causes me no discomfort and won't hinder my enquiries in any way."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Inquisitor zuckt missmutig zusammen.{/n} "Euer kaum durchdachtes Verhalten ist ebenso unangemessen wie gefährlich. Für Euch. Mich stört es nicht, und es wird auch meine Ermittlungen in keiner Weise behindern."

languages.text: {n}Engizisyoncu hoşnutsuzlukla irkiliyor.{/n} "Bu düşüncesizce davranışın hem uygunsuz hem de tehlikeli. Kendin için yani. Bana herhangi bir rahatsızlık vermiyor, soruşturmamı da hiçbir şekilde etkilemeyecek."
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor winces in displeasure.{/n} "Your ill-considered behaviour is both inappropriate and dangerous. For you. It causes me no discomfort and won't hinder my enquiries in any way."

traits.locale_text: {n}Engizisyoncu hoşnutsuzlukla irkiliyor.{/n} "Bu düşüncesizce davranışın hem uygunsuz hem de tehlikeli. Senin için. Bana herhangi bir rahatsızlık vermiyor ve soruşturmamı herhangi bir şekilde etkilemeyecek."
